Solve all problems by hand, and using R code. Some problems may not have solutions.

$$\mathbf{A} = \left[\begin{array}{rr}
2 & 7  \\
1 & 8  \\ \end{array}\right]
\mathbf{B} = \left[\begin{array}{rrr}
1 & 3 & 7\\
4 & 2 & 6 \\ \end{array}\right]
\mathbf{C} = \left[\begin{array}{rrr}
1 & 3 & 7\\
4 & 2 & 6 \\
3 & 9 & 2 \\ \end{array}\right]
\mathbf{D} = \left[\begin{array}{rr}
1 & 3  \\
4 & 5  \\
\end{array}\right]$$

```{r}
a_1<-c(2,7)
a_2<-c(1,8)
rbind(a_1,a_2)

A<-matrix(data = c(2,1,7,8), 
          nrow = 2,
          ncol =2)

B<-matrix(data = c(1,4,3,2,7,6),
          nrow = 2)

C<-matrix(c(1,4,3,3,2,9,7,6,2),
          3)

D<-matrix(data = c(1,4,3,5),
          nrow = 2)
```
